chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_351
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
ional age (weeks) <14 20 26 30 34 36 38 40 
Classifying form indicating eligibility for BANC         
History taken         
Full clinical examination         
Estimated date of delivery calculated         
Blood pressure taken         
Maternal height/weight/MUAC/BMI         
Haemoglobin test         
Rapid syphilis test performed   Retest monthly if syphilis negative 
Urine tested for protein, sugar         
Rapid Rh performed         
Mental Health Screen Screen in each trimester 
HIV counsel
